attributes.action: do more to combat global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is about time that the governmnet started to implement more legislation so that the u.k can start to combat global  warming.  lets get teh cars off the road, and provide better public transport.  we should be doing more to prevent global warming

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
